hero.h-3: I build things for the web.
hero.p: I'm a full stack web developer from Egypt.

about.title: About me
about.p-1:
Hello! My name is Youssef, and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet from front to back. I have a passion for learning new technologies and am often amazed by the progress we programmers made so far. I'm a self-taught developer and I have experience building websites and mobile apps using a wide range of languages and technologies.

My programming journey started in 2016 and I'm looking forward to using my skills to build awesome things ‚ù§
about.p-2: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently
